name: Savory Cucumber and Green Chartreuse Frozen Daiquiri
description: Cool cucumbers and herbal Green Chartreuse make for a savory, intriguing spin on the frozen daiquiri that's wonderfully refreshing.
recipeIngredient: 8 ounces white rum, such as Caña Brava
4 ounces freshly squeezed juice from 4 limes
4 cucumber spears and lime zest for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: At least 1 day before you'd like to serve the cocktail, combine rum, lime juice, Green Chartreuse, and simple syrup in an airtight container. Store in the freezer for at least 8 hours.

Pour pre-chilled base into blender with cucumber rounds and ice. Blend until even in texture—you should no longer hear ice rattling in the blender when you pause. Pour into serving glasses, garnish each drink with a cucumber spear and lime zest, and serve.
